definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: †[[מְעִי]] only in [[מַפָּלָה]] ´[[והיתה מ]] Is 17:1; acc. to AV RV Thes al.

definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: = [[עִי]] ruin-heap, but form very strange; LXX om. (e)/stai ei)v ptw=sin); Gr prop. [[כְּעִי]], Di [[לְעִי]]; < dittogr. from [[מעיר]] Lag:Sem. i. 29 Che Nö:ZMG xxxii. 1878, 401 Brd SS Buhl Gu:in Kau Du.
